about_the_game:
Hypoxia is an exciting and interactive fiction video game where YOUR DECISIONS will change the story.

SYNOPSIS


Since the Z gas appeared in the atmosphere 99 years ago, it is no longer possible to breath properly outside. As a result, almost all modern societies collapsed during the oxygen wars. On the Orbis Island, people survive thanks to a dome maintained and supplied with clean air by the Massive Air Company. However, the origins of the catastrophe remain unknown and the island suffers from a great political instability.

Carl Thanavan is a young scientist living in the Dome and determined to find the truth. As he accepts to host his sister’s friend Shaimaa, he doesn’t think that this decision will force him to put aside his ambitions and face his fear of the outside. On his journey, he will meet Olivia and take part unwillingly in the beginning of a revolution. He will then realize that the greatest threat for humanity was perhaps not the one he believed.

CONTENT


  • « Hypoxia - One last Breath » is the 1st part of the Hypoxia series, an independant visual novel series. Approximate length is 2-3 hours.
  • 1 true ending, 5 alternative endings and 1 secret ending (will you be able to find it?).
  • Beautiful art style, with 15 backgrounds and 26 CGs (variations included).
  • 6 sprite characters in perfect anime style.
  • Original soundtrack and theme songs.

legal_notice: Creative Commons BY-NC : This license allows remix, adapt, and build upon this work non-commercially, and although the new works must also acknowledge the developpers and be non-commercial, they don’t have to be licensed on the same terms.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 recommended

name: Hypoxia - One Last Breath

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 recommended

short_description: A breathtaking sci-fi visual novel! Since the Z gas appeared in the atmosphere, it is no longer possible to breath outside the Dome. You play as Carl Thanavan, a young scientist determined to uncover the origin of the catastrophe. Which path will you choose?
